scenes.action_text: BELLE Written by Misan Sagay An intricate piano piece - GEORGE FREDERICK HANDEL... INTERCUT WHITE ON BLACK CREDITS WITH BELOW... 1 INT. RUSTIC STUDIO OF AN ARTISAN. DAY 1 1 * A series of shots. Blue sky through shabby windows. Run down walls. A paint splashed pine floor. Tens of paint brushes soaking in stained jars. An artisan's hands - weather-worn, swirling a paint brush in dirty water that sways at
